metadata.synopsis: A flaming fist takes a halfling's deposition considering the recent disappearance of the redcaps kept in cages around the feywild circus. This is the halfling's one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to -6.5; 58; -95- Take to the halfling

0.speaker: Edmundis Magarus
0.text: The missing redcaps will find a stray cat or two to nibble on, and be back home in a jiffy - you'll see.

1.speaker: Edmundis Magarus
1.text: All this kerfuffle over missing redcaps! Yes, we'd caged them due to... unruly behaviour, but - as our redcap cleaners demonstrate - most are perfectly harmless!
